title: Bug whit winter skin
body: I baught the winter wonder Oriana skin but when I look at my purchases they say that I baught the one of gangplank me and my friend were there and he approves seeing me click on the Oriana skin and not the gangplank one... I just want to know if I can have my rp back because I didn't want the one of gangplank:(

replies.body:
Hiya! 

If this purchase just happened, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) to Player Support so we can take a look at your account and see if we can make an adjustment.
